name: Rollcage Stage II
description:
Rollcage Stage 2 is a game created by Psygnosis Limited in 2000 and is available for download.

Rollcage is one of those race games you keep on playing. It is just fun for a little spin if you have some spare time on your computer.
Get your racer through awesome stages, shoot down competitors and pick up nice goodies.
Have fun!
